attributes.action: re-evaluate the decision to downgrade ST RICHARDS hospital to having NO A&E
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The decision to downgrade St Richards hospital has been announced in plans in place over the next 5yrs.  This is a catastrophic decision and will not only leave blood on the MPs hands as people will die in traffic on their way to Worthing, but will also see local economy suffer as surrounding private hospitals such as the Chichester Nuffield, will also be forced to close as they rely on trauma patients from St Richards.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "re-evaluate the decision to downgrade ST RICHARDS hospital to having NO A&E."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16950


Prime Minister's Office
